title: Taming Keys
description: It’s the past that shapes a person into who they are destined to become.In 1993, Benjamin “Keys” Taylor had it all. A rewarding career with the Marie Corps and the love a good woman waiting at home, until a night out on shore leave sets in motion changes he never saw coming.Once back on home soil, he was unable to resist his need to see his woman, Donna. In his haste to reconnect, he inadvertently put her in the crosshairs of an enemy. One that was set on destroying the one Keys loved the most in order to hurt the Charon MC. Surviving the fallout was not easy for either of them, but their love for each other was strong enough for them to make it through. Now, they find themselves with a new house guest, a woman who’s been horribly abused and needs their help. But her presence is bringing those old, vicious memories all back to the forefront, once more testing the strength of their love for one another.
author: Khloe Wren
